text: Hello there, my name is Sheikh Shamsuddin and I am from Hyderabad, presently pursuing my Bachelor of Technology in Mechanical Engineering
Stream from Guru Nanak Institution's Technical Campus. Coming to my grade points out of 8 semesters, I have appeared for 5 semesters,
which makes my average grade points 8.0 CGP. I had done my summer internship on steady on EP break systems at South Central Railway Carriage Workshop, Lala Guda.
Coming to my skills, being a mechanical engineering, I have learnt some basic skills like designing in AutoCAD and CatEye.
Apart from mechanical skills, I have also learnt some programming languages like C. Throughout my college, not only I have good grades,
but I was also involved in extracurricular activities and I was awarded as best class representative in my BTEC first year.
Currently, I am involved in a mini project and my project title is Railway Track Cleaning Robot.
I want to join your company because I feel this company will provide me an excellent opportunity to learn and grow.
I assure you, if given a chance, I will give my 100% to your company and I will prove a great asset to your organization.
If you would like to know more about me, I will be waiting to hear from you. Thank you.
